description: Number of ways of getting no pair, a pair, 2 pair, 3 of a kind, other straight, other flush, full house, 4 of a kind, other straight flush, a royal flush, or 5 of a kind in 5-card poker when joker is wild.
references: J. Scarne, Scarne's Complete Guide to Gambling, Simon and Schuster, 1961, p. 585.
links: Index entries for sequences related to poker
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
